          <title>
            <string language="en">Phase change in matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Phase Änderung im Stoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changement de phase de matière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança da fase na matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamento di fase nella materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή φάσης σε θέμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio de la fase en materia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the change in the states of matter through melting, boiling, condensing and freezing.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">freezing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particle model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Änderung in den 
Zuständen des Stoffes durch das Schmelzen, das Kochen, das 
Kondensieren und das Einfrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le changement des 
états de matière par la fonte, l'ébullition, la condensation et la 
congélation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a mudança nos estados 
da matéria com do derretimento, ferver, condensar-se e congelar-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che il cambiamento in
dichiara della materia con la fusione, l'ebollizione, 
condensare e congelare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αλλαγή στις 
καταστάσεις του θέματος μέσω της τήξης, να βράσει, της 
συμπύκνωσης και του παγώματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el cambio en los 
estados de la materia con derretir, hervir, condensar y congelar.</string>
          </description>
